channel.title: Joel Hans
channel.description: I'm Joel. I'm a writer, teacher, and developer of things related to writing and teaching on the web.

item.title: How to reverse a stupid Hampton Bay fan
item.description: Here's the documentation on how to reverse the direction of a stupid Hampton Bay fan and remote combination that have no reverse buttons or switches.
item.author: j@joelhans.com (Joel Hans)

item.title: Get started with Athens Research
item.description: Learn how get the most out of your first 15 minutes with Athens, a free and open-source tool from Athens Research for building and maintaining a personal knowledge graph.
item.author: j@joelhans.com (Joel Hans)
